briefTitle: Study of the Safety and Efficacy of OmegaD Softgels in the Treatment of Dry Eye Disease
officialTitle: A Randomized, Multicenter, Double-Masked, Placebo-Controlled Study of the Safety and Efficacy of OmegaD Softgels in the Treatment of Dry Eye Disease
summary: This is a phase 3 study to evaluate the safety and efficacy of OmegaD softgels for the treatment of dry eye disease. A daily dose of 2 OmegaD softgels dosed orally BID will be compared to 2 placebo softgels dosed orally BID for 84 days. Approximately 164 subjects will be evaluated for their signs and symptoms of dry eye disease and for safety throughout the study.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Tear Break up Time(TBUT ) at Day 84
